members.member: This class is an iterator over all tuples in a finite cartesian product of finite sets. Some special cases: if the number of sets passed in is zero, then the Cartesian product contains one element, the empty tuple. If an empty set is passed in, then the Cartesian product is empty.
A List of iterators storing the tuple-iterator's state.
Returns true if there are any more elements in the Cartesian product to return.
